Body:
import os
import pydevd
environ = os.environ.copy()
cwd = os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(__file__))
assert os.path.isdir(cwd)
resources_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(pydevd.__file__),
    'tests_python', 'resources')
assert os.path.isdir(resources_dir)
attach_to_process_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(pydevd.__file__),
    'pydevd_attach_to_process')
assert os.path.isdir(attach_to_process_dir)
pydevd_dir = os.path.dirname(pydevd.__file__)
assert os.path.isdir(pydevd_dir)
environ['PYTHONPATH'] = (cwd + os.pathsep + resources_dir + os.pathsep +
    attach_to_process_dir + os.pathsep + pydevd_dir + os.pathsep + environ.
    get('PYTHONPATH', ''))
return cwd, environ
